mapper.sql: id, name, shop_fk, memo, valid, updater_fk, creator_fk, date_update, date_create
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.name, b.shop_name, a.memo, a.valid, a.date_create from scs_accessory a join scs_shop b on a.shop_fk=b.id where a.valid = 1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into scs_accessory (id, name, memo, valid, updater_fk, creator_fk, date_update, date_create, shop_fk) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{updater_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, now(), now(), #{shop_fk,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select * from sys_attachment where transaction_id in (select id from scs_accessory where shop_fk= (select robot.shop_fk from cms_robot robot inner join scs_shop shop on robot.shop_fk=shop.id where robot.sn='test02'))
